DOC.brief_title: Stress Fertility : How Lower Stress When Trying Conceive
DOC.detailed_description: Although stress likely cause infertility , research show negative effect psychological stress vitro fertilization ( IVF ) outcomes . IVF process also show increase stress infertility patient . Patients fail IVF cycle note stress . The practice elective egg freeze relatively new little known psychological wellbeing patient start ovarian stimulation egg freezing . The practice yoga show effective stress reduce agent . The investigator demonstrate pilot project yoga posture couple yoga focused discussion session decrease stress infertility patient compare control . Therefore , purpose study explore relationship determine aspect intervention impact . Participants include woman history least one IVF failure woman undergo fertility preservation elective egg freezing . The participant elect include yoga part infertility treatments self select one three treatment group : 1 ) In person yoga + discussion ; 2 ) online yoga + discussion ; 3 ) In person discussion . The investigator also recruit non-yoga participators control group . The yoga participant control ask fill two questionnaire : The State-Trait Anxiety Inventory ( STAI ) Fertility Problem Inventory ( FPI ) . STAI widely use measure trait anxiety ( person 's disposition towards anxious time ) state anxiety ( anxious person feel present time ) . It 40-question survey use 4-point Likert scale per question . A score 20 corresponds low anxiety score 80 corresponds high anxiety . It show higher anxiety score exist infertility population . Mean STAI score infertility population range 30-50 . The FPI use another tool assess person 's state anxiety find good discriminate general stress infertility-related stress . Participants complete begin participation six week later . The design study include pre-test post-test analysis . The primary outcome determine whether stress reduction great woman participate yoga posture discussion group compare discussion group control . The secondary hypothesis reduction stress equivalent online in-person participators . Additional outcome include assessment whether age demographic factor influence baseline stress level reduction stress . The investigator also plan examine whether yoga participation influence ovarian stimulation pregnancy outcomes . Therefore , baseline patient demographic characteristic , clinical outcome regard ovarian stimulation well future pregnancy outcome also collect . The investigator plan recruit least 150 participant currently undergo in-vitro fertilization ( IVF ) Fertility Centers Illinois ( FCI ) 150 patient undergoing elective egg freeze fertility preservation FCI . Those 150 patient subdivide one three treatment group mention control group . Before start study , participant interested treatment group involve yoga posture evaluate include review medical history assessment ability perform basic , gentle yoga without injury . All intervention occur weekly total six week . The participant expect participate least five six session order complete study . If participant person yoga + discussion group , complete Yoga Fertility class Pulling Down Moon : An Integrative Center Fertility consist 30 minute discussion session follow 60 minute Vinyasa style yoga class . If participant online yoga + discussion group , attend online webinar Yoga Fertility class engage home yoga practice Pulling Down Moon Yoga DVD . If participant discussion group , attend in-person 30 minute discussion session Pulling Down Moon . The investigator use paired t-tests compare mean pre-test post-test score group logistic regression evaluate secondary outcome .
DOC.criteria: History one prior IVF failure plan undergo subsequent IVF cycle Fertility Centers Illinois ( FCI ) OR Patients undergoing elective egg freeze fertility preservation FCI Deemed medically able perform basic , gentle yoga without injury Other medical problem preclude yoga participation ( though may eligible control group participation )
